channel.title: Help w/ DeltaScape Client! Please help!
channel.description:
Everytime I try to load a deltascape client I download I always get the following error...
[code]Could not find the main class. Program will exit.[/code]
Here is the code for my run.bat...
[code]@echo off @CD ./Bin/ start javaw -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 @Exit[/code]
It should work but doesn't? Any ideas on to what might be wrong? Please help.

item.title: Help w/ DeltaScape Client! Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“dmannn0120, post:1, topic:428237”]Everytime I try to load a deltascape client I download I always get the following error…

Here is the code for my run.bat…

@echo off @CD ./Bin/ start javaw -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 @Exit

It should work but doesn’t? Any ideas on to what might be wrong? Please help.[/quote]

@CD ./Bin/
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .; client 0 0 highmem members 0
@Exit

You’re welcome.

Read full topic
item.source: Help w/ DeltaScape Client! Please help!

item.title: Help w/ DeltaScape Client! Please help!
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

delete the “@Exit” at the bottem and try again
